S06bsu030_u:1870: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1871: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? parijñāto hi taiḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ, parijñātaṃ pratītyasamutpādasyārambaṇam /
S06bsu030_u:1872: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca, tatra na kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1874: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1879: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1881: yā ca parijñā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇasya, tasyāṃ na kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1883: na [Vaidya_45] hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1885: yā ca parijñā sarvārambaṇānām, tatra na kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1887: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1889: yā ca vaśikā ārambaṇaparijñā, tasyā na kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1891: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1893: yā ca vibhāvanā, tasyā na kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1895: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1897: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tasyāṃ kācidbhāvanā, na ca tasyāṃ bhūyaḥ kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1899: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1901: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1903: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1905: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kācidbhūyaścaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1907: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1909: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1911: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1913: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1915: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1917: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1919: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:1921: yā ca parijñā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1923: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:1932: yā ca vibhāvanā, na tatra kāciccaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1937: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati /
S06bsu030_u:1939: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena rūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1941: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1942: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:1944: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena yāvanmanaārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1945: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1946: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1947: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena yāvaddharmārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1948: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1949: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1950: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena nāmarūpārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1951: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1952: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1954: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1955: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1959: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1960: tatkasya hetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1961: yā evaṃ caryā, iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:1962: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1964: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1965: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1966: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1967: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1968: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1971: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1974: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1975: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhāni hi tena atītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇāni parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:1976: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1977: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena asaṅgārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1978: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1980: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:1981: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? prakṛtipariśuddhaṃ hi tena sarvajñatārambaṇaṃ parijñātam /
S06bsu030_u:1985: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:1986: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1990: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2000: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2005: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2009: na vijñānamatītamiti carati, na anāgatam, na pratyutpannam //
S06bsu030_u:2010: na rūpamātmeti carati, na rūpamātmīyamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2012: na vijñānamātmeti carati, na vijñānamātmīyamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2021: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
S06bsu030_u:2046: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni /
S06bsu030_u:2051: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:2054: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti, na samutthāpayanti /
S06bsu030_u:2055: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:2056: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2069: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni /
S06bsu030_u:2070: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2072: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat - acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2113: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā, tenocyate acintyeti //
S06bsu030_u:2116: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:2118: tatra cittamapi vivṛtam, yena viparyāsenotpadyate tadati vivṛtam /
S06bsu030_u:2119: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /
S06bsu030_u:2120: yatrāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtam, yenāpyutpadyeta tadapi vivṛtamiti /
S06bsu030_u:2125: te cittamabhiniviśya kuśalamiti vā abhiniviśante, akuśalamiti vā abhiniviśante /
S06bsu030_u:2126: sukhamiti vā abhiniviśante, duḥkhamiti vā abhiniviśante /
S06bsu030_u:2155: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati /
S06bsu030_u:2157: yā ca cittasya prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā prakṛtipariśuddhatā, tatra na kāciccittasyotpattiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2159: tatra bodhisattvo 'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate?
S06bsu030_u:2161: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /
S06bsu030_u:2162: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2163: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
S06bsu030_u:2164: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2166: ya evaṃ carati bodhisattvaḥ, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2167: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2175: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
S06bsu030_u:2177: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2178: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2179: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2180: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2181_0: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā
S06bsu030_u:2182: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā //
S06bsu030_u:2183: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat /
S06bsu030_u:2184: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2186: yā bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃścaryā, neyaṃ caryā bālapṛthagjanānām /
S06bsu030_u:2187: nāpīyaṃ caryā śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakayānīyānām, nāpi pratyekabuddhayānīyānām /
S06bsu030_u:2188: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:2189: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro 'bhaviṣyat - śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti /
S06bsu030_u:2190: bodhisattvā evābhaviṣyan, te 'pi tathāgatā vā caturvaiśāradyaprāptā abhaviṣyan /
S06bsu030_u:2191: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
S06bsu030_u:2192: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu030_u:2195: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu030_u:2196: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
S06bsu030_u:2197: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2204: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /
S06bsu030_u:2205: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena /
S06bsu030_u:2206: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu030_u:2207: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
S06bsu030_u:2210: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2217: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2218: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2219: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2223: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2228: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2230: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2231: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān)
S06bsu030_u:2233: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2250: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kācidasti bhāvapariniṣpattiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2253: abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ, abhūtā asaṃbhūtāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2262: yaśca abhāva, tatra na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā /
S06bsu030_u:2263: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca /
S06bsu030_u:2265: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? abhāvasvabhāvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ, bhāvāpagatā vastvasattvāt /
S06bsu030_u:2267: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:2269: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2271: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
S06bsu030_u:2272: na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskāraḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2296: so 'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā /
S06bsu030_u:2301: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2302: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2303: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:2306: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2318: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2320: na pṛthagjanadharmān, na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmānupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2325: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin anupagatā anupādattāḥ, na kenacidupagatāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2326: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2328: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? asārakā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā māyopamatayā /
S06bsu030_u:2336: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya /
S06bsu030_u:2339: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
S06bsu030_u:2342: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2343: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2344: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2346: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu030_u:2347: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:2348: na rūpotpattau śikṣate, na rūpanirodhe śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:2349: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2350: na vijñānotpattau śikṣate, na vijñānanirodhe śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:2355: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
S06bsu030_u:2357: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2366: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
S06bsu030_u:2369: na vedanā, na saṃjñā, na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2370: na vijñānātītārambaṇe carati, nānāgatārambaṇe carati, na pratyutpannārambaṇe carati /
S06bsu030_u:2371: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
S06bsu030_u:2374: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2376: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2378: atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena [Vaidya_55] vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2380: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2382: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
S06bsu030_u:2384: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2385: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
S06bsu030_u:2386: evaṃ caran sarvamārakarmāṇi budhyate, na ca tairmārakarmabhiḥ saṃhriyate //
S06bsu030_u:2387: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
S06bsu030_u:2388: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06bsu030_u:2430: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta /
S06bsu030_u:2431: yāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin ālambanam, tāvadadhyavasānam, tāvadabhiniveśaḥ, tāvadupādānam /
S06bsu030_u:2444: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate /
S06bsu030_u:2446: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2447: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
S06bsu030_u:2449: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2450: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2451: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
S06bsu030_u:2455: na cāsya te 'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ, yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā dharṣayeyuḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2462: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2463: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2465: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2490: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2491: [Vaidya_57] na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2496: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2503: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? kalpanāyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin satyāṃ vikalpo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2504: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpanā nāsti, na tatra vikalpanā /
S06bsu030_u:2508: kalpaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin eṣa eko 'ntaḥ, vikalpaneti dvitīyo 'ntaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2509: yatra nāsti kalpo vā vikalpo (vā), tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:2510: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2513: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā, tatra kalpasamucchedaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2515: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2523: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06bsu030_u:2526: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2527: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarva(kalpa)vikalpaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2528: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2529: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyānantarāyasthito bhavati, na ca māraparṣat /
S06bsu030_u:2532: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca /
S06bsu030_u:2568: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantum //
S06bsu030_u:2569: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2584: sa ālokalabdhaśca bhavati buddhadharmeṣu, atyāsannaśca bhavati sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2590: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati - atikrāntaviṣayo 'yaṃ mama,
S06bsu030_u:2595: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate - alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti /
S06bsu030_u:2596: daurbalyaṃ cāsya viśati, duḥkhitaśca bhavati durmanā vipratisārī /
S06bsu030_u:2597: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:2601: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ - ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
S06bsu030_u:2611: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2612: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)
S06bsu030_u:2614: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2619: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti - kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2622: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2624: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:2627: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2629: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum,
S06bsu030_u:2634: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
S06bsu030_u:2638: evaṃrūpaṃ prajñābalādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati, evaṃrūpeṇa ca prajñābalādhiṣṭhānena samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2641: te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2642: te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu030_u:2644: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2645: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2646: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum /
S06bsu030_u:2651: ye 'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2653: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu [Vaidya_60] sadevanikāyeṣu,
S06bsu030_u:2657: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
S06bsu030_u:2658: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
S06bsu030_u:2659: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:2661: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:2665: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2668: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca)
S06bsu030_u:2669: bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti, aparimuktāśca bhavanti te māraviṣayāt /
S06bsu030_u:2670: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2672: aparimuktāśca te mārapāśebhyaḥ, anugatasūtrāśca te mārapāśaiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2674: ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2675: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:2677: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
S06bsu030_u:2714: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati, niśrayāśca tena sarve vibhāvitā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:2715: aniśritaśca sa mārgamapi nābhiniviśate, aniśrayaṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2718: asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
S06bsu030_u:2720: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno 'nupalabhamāno 'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu030_u:2722: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2731: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2744: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran,
S06bsu030_u:2748: nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
S06bsu030_u:2753: saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /
S06bsu030_u:2756: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante //
S06bsu030_u:2757_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:2757_1: deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2758: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2759: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2762: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:2764: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:2767: na ca mārakarmabhiḥ saṃhriyate, na ca mārakarmavaśago bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:2768: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti //
S06bsu030_u:2769: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:2780: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:2783: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:2784: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:2786: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2788: na rūpārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2789: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2792: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:2795: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2797: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:2799: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:2802: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2803: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2805: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2806: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2807: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:2818: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:2841: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2842: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena /
S06bsu030_u:2843: saṃyoga iti hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śāśvatapadametat, visaṃyoga ityuccheda eṣaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2844: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
S06bsu030_u:2845: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:2846: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:2850: , vedako vā vedayitā vā, jñātā vā jñāpayitā vā, saṃyojako vā visaṃyojako vā /
S06bsu030_u:2851: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ - ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2857: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
S06bsu030_u:2858: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2866: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
S06bsu030_u:2867: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsasya vastūpalabhyate, nāpi saṃbhava upalabhyate /
S06bsu030_u:2868: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? abhūto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāsaḥ, vitatho mṛṣādharmastucchaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2869: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
S06bsu030_u:2870: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
S06bsu030_u:2874: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
S06bsu030_u:2875: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
S06bsu030_u:2876: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
S06bsu030_u:2877: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti /
S06bsu030_u:2883: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:2886: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā, saṃyukta evāsau bhavenna visaṃyuktaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2887: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
S06bsu030_u:2888: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:2889: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2890: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2891: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:2892: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2894: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:2895: na rūpāsaṅgārambaṇe carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati /
S06bsu030_u:2896: na rūpāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati, na rūpāsaṅgatāvisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2897: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2899: na rūpāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpāsaṅgatāviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2900: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2902: na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati, na rūpārambaṇaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:2903: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:2906: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:2908: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:2910: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:2912: na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati, na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannāviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:2913: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:2917: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:2920: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:2923: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2925: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2927: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2928: na vijñānaṃ vivṛtamiti carati, na vijñānamavivṛtamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2929: na rūpaṃ śāntamiti carati, rūpamaśāntamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2930: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2931: na vijñānaṃ śāntamiti carati, na vijñānamaśāntamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2932: na rūpaṃ prakṛtivivṛtamiti carati, na rūpaṃ prakṛtyavivṛtamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2933: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2934: na vijñānaṃ prakṛtivivṛtamiti carati, na vijñānaṃ prakṛtyavivṛtamiti carati /
S06bsu030_u:2936: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2938: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:2939: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:2940: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2941: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
S06bsu030_u:2942: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:2943: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2944: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2945: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:2947: rūpaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, rūpārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2949: vijñānaviśuddhiṃ na manyate, vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhiṃ na manyate //
S06bsu030_u:2950: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ (prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran) rūpaṃ nābhiniviśate /
S06bsu030_u:2959: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2960: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
S06bsu030_u:2964: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
S06bsu030_u:2972: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2973: [Vaidya_67] evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2975: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
S06bsu030_u:2979: na kāmarūpārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhate, nātmadhātau, na sattvadhātau pratiṣṭhate /
S06bsu030_u:3008: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:3012: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya?)
S06bsu030_u:3013: darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3016: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3018: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:3025: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S06bsu030_u:3028: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3030: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
S06bsu030_u:3034: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ [Vaidya_68] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3035: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
S06bsu030_u:3041: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
S06bsu030_u:3062: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3067: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3068_0: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi
S06bsu030_u:3068_1: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya
S06bsu030_u:3069: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06bsu030_u:3070: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
S06bsu030_u:3071: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3074: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā - mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
S06bsu030_u:3076: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3077: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3078: atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya,
S06bsu030_u:3081: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
S06bsu030_u:3082: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3083: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3085: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3086: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06bsu030_u:3089: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca //
S06bsu030_u:3090: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3097: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3099: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3102: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3104: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3112: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
S06bsu030_u:3113: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3117: veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3119: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:3121: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3123: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya [Vaidya_70] kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:3125: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3130: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3134: te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3136: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3137: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3138: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3144: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3145: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
S06bsu030_u:3146: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3150: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3151: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:3152: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3153: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim //
S06bsu030_u:3154: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3156: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3157: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3159: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
S06bsu030_u:3160: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3161: ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ [Vaidya_71] sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāvabhāsena pratyupasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3166: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo 'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:3169: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:3170: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:3174: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca /
S06bsu030_u:3175: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3177: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvalokābhyudgataśikṣā hyeṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin yaduta prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:3179: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
S06bsu030_u:3184: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3185: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
S06bsu030_u:3210: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bandhanaṃ nopalabhyate /
S06bsu030_u:3211: asaṅgā abaddhā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin [Vaidya_72] sarvadharmāḥ, tena teṣāṃ vimuktirnopalabhyate /
S06bsu030_u:3212: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3217: nātra kaścidupalabhyate, yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā badhyeta vā /
S06bsu030_u:3218: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā, tena asaṅga ityucyate /
S06bsu030_u:3219: abaddha iti suvikrāntavikrāmin bandhānanupalabdhitaḥ, bandhanābhūtatayā abaddha ityucyate /
S06bsu030_u:3220: na hi tatra kiṃcidbandhanaṃ vidyate, nāpi tatra kaścidupalabhyate yo baddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3221: yataśca nopalabhyate yo baddhaḥ, tena abaddha ityucyate /
S06bsu030_u:3223: yaśca na sajjate na badhyate, mukto 'sau visaṃyuktaḥ śītībhūto vipramuktaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3228: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3230: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
S06bsu030_u:3232: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum //
S06bsu030_u:3233_0: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate
S06bsu030_u:3233_1: sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam - śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte
S06bsu030_u:3233_2: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye
S06bsu030_u:3235: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ
S06bsu030_u:3238: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3239: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3240_1: paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā
S06bsu030_u:3240_2: asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo 'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ
S06bsu030_u:3241: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3242: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
S06bsu030_u:3243: ye ca tasminnantakāle parīttaparīttā api [Vaidya_73] sattvā bhaviṣyanti ebhirdharmairarthikāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3254: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3255: mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot /
S06bsu030_u:3256: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3258: devā api manuṣyān paśyanti sma, manuṣyā api devān /
S06bsu030_u:3262: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
S06bsu030_u:3263: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
S06bsu030_u:3264: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3265: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3267: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3269: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:3272: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena /
S06bsu030_u:3273: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3276: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3280: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3283: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3289: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3290: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin [Vaidya_74] upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3293: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3295: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
S06bsu030_u:3296: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3297: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3299: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3302: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3303: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3305: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3308: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu030_u:3310: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya //
S06bsu030_u:3321: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās
S06bsu030_u:3323: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu030_u:3324: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
